reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

description.narrative: Viet Nam - Tuberculosis - Viet Nam National Lung Hospital - NTP. This program has the following goals: Find and treat all TB cases to decrease transmission. Find and treat those who are infected with TB to prevent progression to active disease. The objectives of this program are: A 22 percent reduction of the incidence of TB by 2023 compared to 2018. A 27 percent reduction in TB mortality in 2023 compared to 2018. Maintain the proportion of MDR-TB among newly diagnosed TB patients below 5 percent
